mapper.select: SELECT num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, deleted, board_comment.regdate, profile FROM T_board_comment INNER JOIN users ON T_board_comment.writer = users.id WHERE ref_group=#{ref_group}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_board_comment (num, writer, content, target_id, ref_group, comment_group, regdate) VALUES(#{num}, #{writer}, #{content}, #{target_id}, #{ref_group}, #{comment_group}, SYSDATE)
